name: The Andromeda Factor Demo
description:
Controls: WASD to move, hold space/ left click to fire.

This is a Galaga style space shooter demo/protoype I made in Unity. It was really fun to make, and I am especially proud of the menus and overall look.

CREDITS:

Code was written by me under Gamedev.tv instruction.

Ship and effect sprites done by Josh Marshall: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/galaxia-2d-space-sho...

Background art by Gary Pettie.

Music by Joth: https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/expansiva-font.html
